issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Test case:
1. Run KitchenSink>Base UI> Views> List View
2. Basic Functions> Background Colors&Scroll Indicator
3. Press Next botton
Actual result:
Background turns red and the latter "e" flickers under ScrollIndicator=false
Expected result:
No flickering

Note: It is happening only when background turns red
fields.summary: iOS: ListView - ScrollIndicator flickering when background is red
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.0.201304052347
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.0.v20130405170202
Devices:
iPad 4 iOS 6.1.3
iPhone5 iOS 6.1.3

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
